name: Firefox fullscreen - Floating hidden toolbars
description: In fullscreen, "Hide Toolbars" mode, the behaviour of hovering toolbars will push content down. This style changes that to floating slide-in toolbars behaviour, much like IE (yes, I said it).
additional_info: DO NOT UNCHECK "Hide Toolbars" mode, as this way, toolbars will remain floating over browser content. Personas will not be seen in fullscreen... sorry can't fix that without a workaround. May be buggy on some sites, let me know if so. • Used best with style 39995 • If you like it please think to donate a small sum.
